document.full_text: the denver nuggets have the most efficient offense in the n.b.a., scoring 109.8 points per 100 possessions (the league average is 104.3  points per 100 possessions). so how have they been able to do it?
document.title: breaking down the nuggets' offense
lines_and_colors: the denver nuggets have the most efficient offense in the n.b.a., scoring 109.8 points per 100 possessions (the league average is 104.3  points per 100 possessions). so how have they been able to do it?
